title: Co-op vs AI overwhelmed by Bot accounts
body: So, basically what we have here is that almost every game you play with a bot on your team. They just farm in the jungle and do nothing(AFK) and this should be addressed as soon as possible. Please Riot intervene..

replies.body: We have systems that tackle exploits or bots and will continue to do so.  Your reports are especially crucial to help our teams tackle them even sooner.  Make sure to hit that report button!
